TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ThemeDictionaryExtension extends System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension

Docs.summary: Implements a markup extension that enables application authors to customize control styles based on the current system theme.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class is a markup extension implementation. Markup extension classes exist mainly to provide infrastructure support for some aspect of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation, and the members exposed by a markup extension are not typically called from user code. This extension supports the [ThemeDictionary Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) usage from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## XAML Text Usage For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [ThemeDictionary Markup Extension](../Topic/ThemeDictionary%20Markup%20Extension.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string assemblyName) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the specified assembly name.
Gets or sets a string setting a particular naming convention to identify which dictionary applies for a particular theme.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Text Usage For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [ThemeDictionary Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object ProvideValue(class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed

Docs.param: An object that can provide services for the markup extension. This service is expected to provide results for <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IXamlTypeResolver>.
Docs.summary: Returns an object that should be set on the property where this extension is applied. For , this is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value for a particular theme dictionary extension.
Docs.returns: The object value to set on the property where the extension is applied.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method supports [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation, and is not intended to be called directly. The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation uses this method for proper handling of `ThemeResourceDictionary` extension values during object creation.
This implementation relies on services based on the passed `serviceProvider`. It must not be `null`. The `serviceProvider` object is expected to implement <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IXamlTypeResolver>.

Docs.exception:
The <xref:System.Windows.ThemeDictionaryExtension.AssemblyName%2A> property is . You must set this value during construction or before using the ProvideValue method.
-or-
r is or does not provide a service for <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IXamlTypeResolver>.
-or-
specifies a target type that does not match <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary.Source%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
